title: Keweenaw National Historical Park: Field Trips
body: Field Trips     Educational Groups are Welcome to Tour the Calumet Visitor Center The Calumet Visitor Center at Keweenaw National Historical Park is a great place for field trips. The Visitor Center is geared toward multiple learning styles and age groups, and contains hands-on exhibits. Plan to spend at least an hour at the Visitor Center although your class may need more. Please review the Pre-Visit Letter to Teachers to learn more about scheduling a visit to the Calumet Visitor Center. Email valerie_newman@nps.gov or call 906-483-3042 to learn about hours of operation and to schedule your field trip!  Educators may also want to provide their students with this Student Guide for the Calumet Visitor Center. This guide provides an active way to explore the various exhibits throughout the building. Traveling to the Calumet Visitor Center or our Heritage Sites can be free!  Transportation Reimbursement Form
